Ema Makura (万ま倉くら 江真えま, Makura Ema) is a minor character in Mato Seihei no Slave.

Originally introduced as the classmate and best friend of Anti-Demon Corps 1st Unit Chief Konomi Tatara, Ema later enlists in the Corps, becoming Konomi's subordinate in the same unit.


Advertisement
Appearance
Ema is a teenage girl with short, dark hair, and a modest physique.

She wears a standard female high school uniform and a fish-shaped hair clip.


Advertisement
Personality
Ema is a generally kind and friendly girl who is also somewhat promiscuous as she teased Konomi Tatara for thinking about kissing and even offered to kiss her.[1]

Synopsis
While Ema is walking home with Konomi Tatara, she asks her about an earlier incident in class in which Konomi accidentally released her Beast Power ability. Konomi explains that she was wondering if kisses feel good, which surprises Ema and she wonders if Konomi has a crush, which Konomi denies. Ema then asks Konomi if she would like to kiss her to satisfy her curiosity, which Konomi surprisingly seems to reciprocate. However, as Konomi seems to lean in for a kiss, the two are suddenly attacked by Yumeji Shimomura, and Konomi pushes Ema out of the way to protect her.[2]

Abilities
Peach Blessing
Thorn Power (桃弧棘矢イバラチカラ, Ibara Chikara, lit. "Peach Bow and Thorn Arrows"): Ema's unique ability allows her to manifest vines with incredibly sharp thorns from her body. She can use her thorns for self-defense, using them to injure a devotee of the Eight Thunder Gods and escape their grasp
